sourceMeaningMnemonic: Birds use <radical>grass</radical> and <radical>fruit</radical> to make their <kanji>nest</kanji>s.
meaningInfo: Picture a cute little nest with a family of birds in it. It looks like it was woven together with bits of grass and strawberries, so it smells delicious too.
readingMnemonic: The bottom of the <kanji>nest</kanji> also seems to be padded with someone's <reading>su</reading>it (<ja>す</ja>). Did... did this bird attack a human for this?!
readingInfo: Picture the nest, made of grass, fruit, and the suit of the angry salaryman who's shouting below the tree, and missing the top half of his suit.
